thread.title: Yannick Bolasie strike helps Crystal Palace to victory - Wharfedale Observer
thread.title_full: Yannick Bolasie strike helps Crystal Palace to victory - Wharfedale Observer - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Wharfedale Observer
title: Yannick Bolasie strike helps Crystal Palace to victory - Wharfedale Observer
text:
Yannick Bolasie's first goal at Selhurst Park in over two-and-a-half years set Crystal Palace on their way to taking all three points from a steely West Brom. The 26-year-old has recently signed a new deal with the Eagles and was a constant thorn in the side of a stubborn Baggies defence - putting Alan Pardew's side ahead before the points were wrapped up as Yohan Cabaye's penalty sealed a 2-0 win.
 Wharfedale Observer.
